header.title: Silverbar MOD
header.description: This MOD allows the board to have a global Sidebar containing useful links and such. Included is a Quick Login module, a mini-MCP module to show if posts are reported or topics/posts unapporved, a module showing recent topics, a mini-UCP module where you can get quick information and have a welcome message, and finally a lower module is included with basic board links and a built-in searchbar.

action-group.diy-instructions: Make sure to refresh the theme and the template in the ACP! ACP -> Styles -> Template -> Refresh ACP -> Styles -> Theme -> Refresh Once all that is done, if you wish to make the MOD a little more powerful (adds more edits though), go on to contrib/silverbar_ucp.xml to install the UCP extension. If you wish to change the side of the sidebar if you don't use the UCP extension, go on to XML/install-right.xml
